short_description: Journey to the heart of Africa and discover the diverse landscapes, rich culture, and warm hospitality of Cameroon. From the lush rainforests to the rugged mountains, this country offers an adventure like no other

weather.title: Cameroon has a diverse climate, ranging from a tropical climate in the coastal regions with high humidity and heavy rainfall, to an arid and Sahelian climate in the northern parts of the country. The coastal areas are generally hot and humid throughout the year, while the northern regions experience hot and dry conditions

when_to_visit.title: Dry season
when_to_visit.short_description: Milder temperatures and lower rainfall, providing comfortable conditions for activities such as wildlife safaris in Waza or hiking the Ring Road

when_to_visit.title: Wet season
when_to_visit.short_description: Expect heavy downpours and thunderstorms along with higher temperatures and humidity. Travel to remote areas will be more difficult

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Cameroon is during the dry season, which typically runs from November to February, when the weather is generally more pleasant with lower rainfall and cooler temperatures
